title: (x) Boeing logo - Stratos (custom font) {Mike Y}
content: Your help will be greatly appreciated. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130409202944im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21624.gif)
author: link

comments.content: I may be mistaken, but I think that's custom.
Thanks . . . do you know of a look alike?

It is a custom font called 'Stratos'. As a former Boeing employee I was aware of that because they told us that formal documents had to use it for certain pages, in certain contexts.   
   
There are probably a number of heavier weight squared sans serif fonts, such as Font Bureau [Agency Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20130409202944/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=FB00000234P1), that could resemble this if they are slanted properly and spaced somewhat tightly.
House's Bullet (Small Caps Alt) is not dissimilar.
